name: Treasure Hunt (Cosaca)
description:
This game was made for the "WeeklyGameJam 169" with the theme "Treasure Hunt".

Treasure Hunt is a card game, in which you have to flip cards until you have the number of chests that each level requires. Then, you will finish the level and kill the monsters.

Enjoy and have fun. If you have any comments or feedback, you can leave a comment below :)
